entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Convert to top-level statements" does not correctly handle code excluded by conditional preprocessor directive #78002
  • Make netfx build task publishing more robust #78001
    Next

Closed

  • Unexpected namespace colorization in implemented interface #78004
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-36003.39 #77997
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-36003.130 #77996

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify workspace initialization in the LSP server #78010
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve detection of code whose updates may not have effect #78009
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Be resilient to (and report) exceptions we encounter when calling into 3rd party extensions in a gladstone context. #78007
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update maintenance-packages versions #78005
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update PublishData.json after VS snap to rel/d17.14 #78003
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use dev17.14 for localization #78000
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bind compound assignment operator declarations #77999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators

Merged

  • Change SolutionState.ProjectStates from an ImmutableDictionary<ProjectId, ProjectState> to an ImmutableArray<ProjectState> #77971
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge 17.15 into main #78006
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce main thread switches in VisualStudioProjectFactory.CreateAndAddToWorkspaceAsync (#77920) #77998
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Another attempt to move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace to a bg thread" #77983
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce main thread switches in VisualStudioProjectFactory.CreateAndAddToWorkspaceAsync #77920
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fix EA layering for Razor.ExternalAccess #77927
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix crash in backing field nullability cycle scenario #77993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Execute core compiler from full framework msbuild #77914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP Merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures #77707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Update ignored directives public API #77968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, breaking-change
  • Extensions: ref safety analysis #77967
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Expression trees: optional arguments #77972
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
